PIN.values: |==========&cr;&lf;INSTRUCTIONS&cr;&lf;==========&cr;&lf;Using the mouse, select a target point in the 'target' window on the right hand side.&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;You can move where the target is by dragging the point&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;When you have a target point selected, you can choose a source position by dragging your mouse in the 'source' window on the left hand side|
|TO NAVIGATE&cr;&lf;========&cr;&lf;Drag with right mouse&cr;&lf;and scroll mouse wheel|
